name: part_004
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア3D新ビジュアルお披露目】お待たせ！！君に早く会いたかったよ！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [BB2zYMB-1G4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Shiranui Flare performing 'Phony' in a 3D urban cityscape.
Shiranui Flare performing 'Fatima' while dancing through the same 3D city setting.

subtitles.original: …私はフォニイ
subtitles.english: ...I am a phony.

subtitles.original: いつしか空の願いが嫌になって
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, I grew tired of the sky's wishes,

subtitles.original: 色の眼があなたを解いている
subtitles.english: and eyes of color are unraveling you.

subtitles.original: 鏡に映る私を欠いて
subtitles.english: Lacking the me reflected in the mirror,

subtitles.original: 誰もが見間違ってフェイク
subtitles.english: everyone mistakes me for a fake.

subtitles.original: どうして愛なんてものに群がり
subtitles.english: Why do we flock to things like love,

subtitles.original: それを欲して生きるのだ 今日も
subtitles.english: and live our lives wanting it even today?

subtitles.original: 泳いでいる夜の電車が通り去っていく
subtitles.english: The night train I'm swimming in passes by.

subtitles.original: 踊り明かせよ
subtitles.english: Dance the night away.

subtitles.original: パッパッパラッパッパラッパッパ
subtitles.english: (Pappapparappapparappappa)

subtitles.original: なになに 騙し打っていきましょう
subtitles.english: What, what? Let's go with a sneak attack.

subtitles.original: パッパッパラッパッパラッパッパ
subtitles.english: (Pappapparappapparappappa)

subtitles.original: なぜなぜ ここが痛むのでしょうか
subtitles.english: Why, why? Does it hurt here?

subtitles.original: 散々な日々は変わらないわ
subtitles.english: These terrible days won't change.

subtitles.original: 絶望の雨は止まないわ
subtitles.english: The rain of despair won't stop.

subtitles.original: さよならも言えぬまま泣いた
subtitles.english: I cried without even being able to say goodbye.

subtitles.original: フォニイ フォニイ フォニイ
subtitles.english: Phony, phony, phony.

subtitles.original: 嘘に絡まっている ただ
subtitles.english: Just entangled in lies.

subtitles.original: 簡単なことも解らないわ
subtitles.english: I don't even understand simple things.

subtitles.original: あたしって何だっけ
subtitles.english: Who was I again?

subtitles.original: それすら夜の手にほだされて アイノヨニ
subtitles.english: Even that is tamed by the night's hand, like love.

subtitles.original: さよならまたねと呟いた
subtitles.english: I muttered "Goodbye, see you again."

subtitles.original: フォニイ フォニイ フォニイ
subtitles.english: Phony, phony, phony.

subtitles.original: 嘘に絡まっているあたしはフォニイ
subtitles.english: Entangled in lies, I am a phony.

subtitles.original: 風だけが知っている秘密のフォニイ
subtitles.english: A secret phony that only the wind knows.

subtitles.original:
ファティマ
作詞 / 作曲：志倉 千代丸
subtitles.english:
Fatima
Lyrics / Composition: Chiyomaru Shikura

subtitles.original: この世界は非現実 ただ すり込まれたビジョン
subtitles.english: This world is unreal, just an imprinted vision.

subtitles.original: 無限遠点 価値観を今 上書きする
subtitles.english: Overwriting values now at the point of infinity.

subtitles.original: 変哲のない宇宙
subtitles.english: An ordinary universe.

subtitles.original: 傲慢な神は目に映らない
subtitles.english: An arrogant god is invisible to the eye,

subtitles.original: 光速度で支配し続ける ならば
subtitles.english: continuing to dominate at the speed of light; then,

subtitles.original: 僕は
subtitles.english: I,

subtitles.original: 僕だけは
subtitles.english: I alone...

subtitles.original: 奇跡的で致命的なマイノリティでいい
subtitles.english: It's fine to be a miraculous and fatal minority.

subtitles.original: I can fly high
subtitles.english: I can fly high

subtitles.original: あの瞬間 あの場面が 君にとって特別なら
subtitles.english: If that moment, that scene, is special to you,

subtitles.original: 過去は離れゆくものなんかじゃなくて
subtitles.english: the past isn't something that just drifts away.

subtitles.original: 一つ付くことの痛みより 大事な真相の全ての
subtitles.english: Rather than the pain of a single prick, all of the important truth...

subtitles.original: 光がいまゼロを生む
subtitles.english: The light now gives birth to zero.

subtitles.original: There is no God, Wonderful New World
subtitles.english: There is no God, Wonderful New World

subtitles.original: この命という有限 まだ 咲くと知らず
subtitles.english: This finite thing called life, not yet knowing it will bloom.

subtitles.original: 二律背反 パラドックスさえ
subtitles.english: Antinomy, even a paradox,

subtitles.original: 限りない世界線であざむき
subtitles.english: deceiving in an endless world line.

subtitles.original: 感情の支配
subtitles.english: Control of emotions,

subtitles.original: 軌道秩序は
subtitles.english: orbital order,

subtitles.original: 常識さえすり替えてゆく ならば
subtitles.english: even common sense is being replaced; then,

subtitles.original: 僕の
subtitles.english: my,

subtitles.original: 僕だけの
subtitles.english: my own...

subtitles.original: 苦しみその欠陥さえ アルゴリズムのまま
subtitles.english: Suffering, even those flaws, remain as part of the algorithm.

subtitles.original: I can fly high
subtitles.english: I can fly high

subtitles.original: 愛の標 愛の言葉 明確になるこの記憶を
subtitles.english: Signs of love, words of love, this memory that becomes clear...

subtitles.original: 二度と彼方に置き去りにはしないから
subtitles.english: I will never leave it behind in the distance again.

subtitles.original: いつでもまだ君のそばに
subtitles.english: I'm still always by your side.

subtitles.original: 隣り合わせの量子が
subtitles.english: When adjacent quanta

subtitles.original: もつれ合えばゼロになる
subtitles.english: entangle, they become zero.

subtitles.original: There is no God, Wonderful New World
subtitles.english: There is no God, Wonderful New World
